item.title: How 40 People Died In a Train Crash in Andalucia, Spain
item.description: The victims of Spain’s deadliest rail crash in more than a decade included a police officer, journalists and a family returning from a musical.

item.title: Taxing the Ultrarich
item.description: The number of billionaires has exploded, yet they often pay taxes at rates well below average.
